tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WeatherData ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    temperature FLOAT NOT NULL, 
    humidity FLOAT NOT NULL, 
    wind_speed FLOAT NOT NULL, 
    weather_conditions VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherUpdates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    update_time TIMESTAMP,
    weather_condition VARCHAR(255),
    advisory_message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
  humidity FLOAT NOT NULL,
  wind_speed FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
  user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  subscription_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
  preference_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
  temperature_unit VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  notification BOOL NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
  humidity FLOAT NOT NULL,
  wind_speed FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE weather_forecast (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  forecast_date DATE NOT NULL,
  expected_temperature FLOAT NOT NULL,
  expected_weather_condition VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE outdoor_activities (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  recommended_temperature_range VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  safety_advice TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    temperature_pref VARCHAR(50),
    alert_pref BOOLEAN
);
